half life in eski bi oyun oldugunu biliordum o yuzden eski kafayla yani grafikler e bakmadan oynamaya calistim ama hikaye anltımı guzel olsada mekanik rezaleeeet ban suan e tamamda eski oyunlar zaten mekanik acısıında  iyi olmadi digebilirisniz fakat bakın doom 3 eher silahta bir cesitlilik var her gorevde farkli sliah kullanablirsin benim gmodd en sevdigm silah olan crossbow la sadece 3 mermi falan ates etmisimdir half life da artık o kadar sıkılmıstımkı oyunun son bolumumjnde noclip ve god mod acık sekilde gravityi gun le son boos uu kesiodumm oyun bittiginde isehic bise hissetmedim ve saat 12 oldugundan  yatagıma yatmistim hala bu oyunu bukadar oynadımmı ya dedim oysaki daha episode 1 ve 2 var

Really nice
TOP

致敬我的童年！！！无论刷了多少次盗版，最后还是补票上车。
剧情、玩法和细节的处理上在当时都算是一流的。
而画质、场景互动性、中文配音放在现在都是一流。
现在出的VR新增可以说也是VR游戏里的划时代作品，V社终于想起了自己还是个游戏厂商。
唯一美中不足的是无论新作，还是旧作，加载地图是起源引擎的弊端，但凡在现在都配固态的时代，这一点点的瑕疵都可以忽略不计了。
PERFECCION

Great game, set standards for it's genre for the time and spawned a lot of mods that became their own thing.

Hands-down the best game I've ever played, story-wise it shocked me, I find the G-Man so amusing that when I saw the ending of the game I got goosebumps. That ending.... it truly was a masterpiece. 
I would recommend going back to the first game and playing the whole franchise again, just to get the feeling of a good game once again, because I doubt we will ever get another game with a story as good as this one.

This game is a total masterpiece, and I am happy to say it is one of my favorite games of all time. I am kind of mad at myself that I did not play this game sooner... The chapters are so unique, and the Gravity Gun and physics were an absolute blast!!! The world and environment was astonishing for a game released in 2004! I felt very immersed in this world of chaos. This game was better than many modern games I have played, and I can definitely understand why this is seen as one of the best games! I thought I would only like the game and not get too attached to it, but this blew me away. It blew me all the way to Xen and back!!!

Half-Life 2, да и вообще вселенная Half-Life по истине шикарна, эта одна из тех игр, которая въелась мне в душу и не собирается от туда уходить. Хороший геймплей, графика, физика, механики в игре выполнены на высочайшем уровне. Вобщем обязательно пройдите этот шедевр.
